**XSSpaylod在浏览器中的解析**

解析过程：HTML解析，URL解析和javascript解析

exp1:href后面是URL，但协议无法识别,URL协议规定用户名密码都必须是ASCII，编码无效

<a href="%6a%61%76%61%73%63%72%69%70%74:%61%6c%65%72%74%28%31%29"></a>

exp2:解析URL，然后解析JS,j代表adcii106 j，后面是urlcode

​    ![0](data:image/png;base64,)

exp3:协议无法识别

<a href="javascript%3aalert(3)"></a>

exp4:HTML编码就是为了显示这些特殊字符，而不干扰正常的DOM解析，所以这里面的内容不会变成一个img元素，也不会被执行。

​    ![0](data:image/png;base64,)

exp5:HTML编码了，但是标签里面不能容纳其他元素</div><div yne-bulb-block="image"  style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">    <img        alt="0"        data-media-type="image" height: 36px;"    /> </div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">exp7:可以执行，html编码</div><div yne-bulb-block="image" height: 37px;"    /> </div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">exp8：不能执行，onclick的值会交给Js处理，在Js中只有字符串和标识符能够用unicode表示，js不能编码'、"、)等</div><div yne-bulb-block="code" data-theme="default" style="white-space:pre-wrap;" data-language=""><button onclick="confirm('8\u0027);">Button</button></div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" id="aZHQ-1735879706096" yne-bulb-block="heading"                     yne-bulb-level="3"                        style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;"><span style="font-weight: bold;font-size: 28px;">防御</span></div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">1.阻止恶意代码注入</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">2.阻止恶意代码执行</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">不管是反射型还是存储型xss，都能通过服务端过滤进行防护：</div><div><ul style="margin:0px;" yne-block-type="list"><li style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;list-style-position:inside;word-break:break-word;color:rgb(0, 0, 0);font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);font-family:"Microsoft YaHei", STXihei;list-style-type:disc;">黑名单：过滤特殊符号及字符</li></ul></div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">如<、>、%、#、/、“、'、；、（、）、script、svg、object、on事件等</div><div><ul style="margin:0px;" yne-block-type="list"><li style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;list-style-position:inside;word-break:break-word;color:rgb(0, 0, 0);font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);font-family:"Microsoft YaHei", STXihei;list-style-type:disc;">白名单：只允许特定类型或符号</li></ul></div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">根据输入的数据特征限制使用的类型，如年龄限制为数字类型；输入类型为字符型限制为仅可使用大小写的26个字母及数字-和_;等</div><div><ul style="margin:0px;" yne-block-type="list"><li style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;list-style-position:inside;word-break:break-word;color:rgb(0, 0, 0);font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);font-family:"Microsoft YaHei", STXihei;list-style-type:disc;">编码及转义</li></ul></div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">输出在标签或属性中进行HTML编码；</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">输出在script标签或事件中进行javascript编码</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">输出在url中进行url编码</div><div><ul style="margin:0px;" yne-block-type="list"><li style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;list-style-position:inside;word-break:break-word;color:rgb(0, 0, 0);font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);font-family:"Microsoft YaHei", STXihei;list-style-type:disc;">cookie中设置httponly</li></ul></div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">setcookie将httponly选项设置为true，防范cookie劫持</div><div><ul style="margin:0px;" yne-block-type="list"><li style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;list-style-position:inside;word-break:break-word;color:rgb(0, 0, 0);font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);font-family:"Microsoft YaHei", STXihei;list-style-type:disc;">确保执行脚本来源可信</li></ul></div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">开发者明确告诉客户端，哪些外部资源可以加载和执行（CSP策略）</div><div><ul style="margin:0px;" yne-block-type="list"><li style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;list-style-position:inside;word-break:break-word;color:rgb(0, 0, 0);font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);font-family:"Microsoft YaHei", STXihei;list-style-type:disc;">不使用有缺陷的第三方库</li></ul></div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">PHP：htmlentities()、htmlspecialchars()</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">Python：cgi.escape()</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">ASP：Server.HTMLEncode()</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">ASP.NET：Server.HtmlEncode()、Microsoft Anti-Cross Site Scripting Libarary</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">Java：xssprotect(Open Source Library）</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;">Node.js：node-validator</div><div yne-bulb-block="paragraph" style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(243, 50, 50);">htmlspecialchars默认配置是不过滤单引号的。只有设置了：quotestyle选项为ENT_QUOTES才会过滤单引号</span></div><div id="eUB7-1735879706149" yne-bulb-block="heading"                     yne-bulb-level="1"                        style="white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.75;font-size:14px;text-align:left;"><span 过滤了script  做script拼接绕过</div><div yne-bulb-block="code" data-theme="default" style="white-space:pre-wrap;" data-language=""><img src=" "
